title: [1.7.2][联机]如何隐藏命令方块！
author: zx121418zx
txt_content:

如何隐藏命令方块的提醒信息





TL_SQJ@OBH(`)$`KUU6CSHI.jpg (51.34 KB, 下载次数: 1)

【多人联机】中隐藏[groupid=187]彩虹糖技术中心[/groupid]

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content:
指令:
/gamerule commandBlockOutput False
补充:
开启为
/gamerule commandBlockOutput True

replies.author: zx121418zx
replies.txt_content:
